price: Afei Yɛnyanee wͻn sεdeε Yɛbɛhunu akuo mmienu no mu deε onim akontabuo a (ͻbetumi) asese mmerε tenten a wͻde tenaa (ͻbodan no mu).
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰهُمۡ لِنَعۡلَمَ أَيُّ ٱلۡحِزۡبَيۡنِ أَحۡصَىٰ لِمَا لَبِثُوٓاْ أَمَدٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: thumma baʿathnāhum linaʿlama ayyu al-ḥiz'bayni aḥṣā limā labithū amadan
